subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Steve Trachsel earned his first victory with the Cubs since being acquired from Baltimore on Aug. 31 and Chicago hit four home runs last night to regain the National League Central lead by beating the host Houston Astros, 6-2.
snippet: Steve Trachsel earned his first victory with the Cubs since being acquired from Baltimore on Aug. 31 and Chicago hit four home runs last night to regain the National League Central lead by beating the host Houston Astros, 6-2.
